name: Something Else
overview: This hack… is something else. Tired of playing all these bad mario romhacks? You should play Something else… This hack is the result of over two years of works. It feature lot of fun and varied levels, a new powerup, an original plot and a lot more. It currently has 69 exits. The game is available in both english (ENG) and french/français (FR). Note: If you are going to play the hack in Zsnes, you may need to change the “per2exec=100″ to “per2exec=150″ in zsnes.cfg to avoid slowdowns. Other emulators should be fine.
